column4: with the compiz desktop wall, is there a way to get a different background on each desktop?
There is a way, but you will lose your desktop icons
Ive never really been a fan of desktop icons, so thats a small price to pay. Im listening.

To set a wallpaper for each viewport using gnome, disable Nautilus from drawing the desktop by setting the gconf key /apps/nautilus/preferences/show_desktop to "false" with gconf-editor. Then, set the four wallpapers in ccsm>Wallpaper
